products.title: Verona Vision Platinum Day and Night Blind
products.metadescription: Verona vision platinum day and night blind in grey. Made to measure from 45.94 with free uk mainland delivery. This day and night blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Revive your interior with the sleek verona vision platinum day and night roller blind. With a funky slatted look combining horizontal strips of light silver polyester fabric and voile, this blind will visually enhance any contemporary space, whilst the innovative design is highly versatile when it comes to adjusting the light and privacy levels in your room.
 
 Product id: db-vrbx1349 fabric colour: platinum material: 100% polyester   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes

products.title: Vision Taupe
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure vision taupe dual roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality dual roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
